question: [File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/state_sync_manager.rs] [Struct: StateSyncManager] [Drop cleanup - Medium] When StateSyncManager is dropped, are all cloned Arc<dyn TExecutionClient> references cleaned up properly, or can they leak? (Medium)
